title: Drill Containment Unit
summaries: The Drill Containment Unit (sometimes abbreviated to DCU) is a Hardmode, post-Moon Lord mount-summoning item that summons a Drill Mount, a rideable, flying vehicle that mines blocks extremely fast via lasers. It can fly and hover indefinitely and has a mining range of 15 tiles.
The Drill Mount is the fastest controllable way to mine in Terraria, but it has certain idiosyncrasies:

• Unlike other mounts, players cannot use any tools or weapons while riding the Drill Mount.
  • Unlike most other mounts, players can fly through liquids while riding the Drill Mount, though they can still drown.
  • Unlike other mining tools, the Drill Mount does not inflict damage on enemies. It also cannot mine blocks behind other blocks, rather always drilling tunnels through all blocks directly ahead of the player.
  • Mining speed bonuses do not affect Drill Mount's mining speed.

The Drill Mount flies at 41 mph vertically, 31 mph mph horizontally, and 51 mph diagonally. It mines all mineable blocks, including furniture and background objects, trees, Lihzahrd Bricks, Altars (during Hardmode), and Shadow Orbs / Crimson Hearts, among others. Pressing ⚷ Open / Activate will allow the Drill Mount to mine background walls. Holding ⚷ Open / Activate and ⚒ Use / Attack simultaneously will mine both blocks and walls.

Crafting the Drill Containment Unit requires a total of 160 <linked>Luminite</linked> (thus requiring defeating <linked>Moon Lord</linked> at least twice), 600 <linked>Chlorophyte Ore</linked>, 600 <linked>Glowing Mushrooms</linked>, 20 <linked>Ectoplasm</linked>, 120 each of <linked>Hellstone</linked> and <linked>Meteorite</linked> ores, and 40 <linked>Obsidian</linked>. This also requires four different <linked>crafting stations</linked>: A <linked>Hardmode Forge</linked> for the <linked>Chlorophyte</linked> and <linked>Spectre Bars</linked>, an <linked>Autohammer</linked> for the <linked>Shroomite Bars</linked>, an <linked>Ancient Manipulator</linked> for the <linked>Luminite Bars</linked>, and a <linked>Hardmode Anvil</linked> for the Drill Containment Unit itself.
